cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.HC. 

The paper discusses the potential consequences of delegating tasks to autonomous AI and intelligent machines, which falls under the category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The plot of a new episode of Black Mirror also suggests a focus on robotics and automation (cs.RO). Additionally, the paper touches on the ethical and societal implications of such a future, which could fall under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper also considers how humans would cope with this future, which could fall under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC).
